ComicInfo.Title: Bubble Cauldron Bubble!; The Tunnel!; Backwash!; The Prize!; The Leopard Men; Food for Thought
ComicInfo.Summary:
Bubble Cauldron Bubble!: Carlo, an unemployed glass blower, uses a magic spell to create a lovely woman to be his wife.
The Tunnel!: A prisoner tries to dig a tunnel to freedom and ends up digging a tunnel to Hell.
Backwash!: Dan Fergus wants to be left alone in his new house. Two beggars are found in the house and Dan kills them but no matter what he does with the bodies, they return to haunt him.
The Prize!: Two mountain climbers set out to be the first to ever reach the summit of a mountain. One mountain climber kills the other so he will be first, but the ghost of the murdered climber leads him to his death.
The Leopard Men: Information about the Leopard Men of Africa.
Food for Thought: Strange foods from around the world.
